text_block_list.text:
The day of the Fan Appreciation Festival 
had arrived.

The school was already crowded with
fans. Even so, even more people are
still expected to come……

So, it was inevitable that that Uma
would make her move.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! Hello everyone! Class
president, super-honor student, that's
me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's a lot of people out here today, 
so be sure to watch out for one another!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Greetings!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Of course, the class president should
keep a watchful eye on these kinds of
events.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But though that may be so, today
is going to be my day to shine even
brighter!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I've registered to run in all sorts of 
events! Roughly thirty different ones!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to show off my speed to 
as many attendees as possible!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Roger that!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
To start with, I'm going to take first
place in the "Spinning Dash" right after
this!

Sakura Bakushin O was awfully
enthusiastic, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm!? There's something noisy around 
here!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Who is it that piques the class
president's curiosity―?!
After that…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ms. Tachyon! Where are you!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Engineering dubious drugs without
permission is strictly prohibited! You
must ask for permissiooon!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Waitwaitwaitwaaaaait!

text_block_list.name: Male Fan
text_block_list.text: Whoa! A gust of wind!

text_block_list.name: Female Fan
text_block_list.text:
Ah, my ice cream fell…! 
Awww….

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hm! A voice coming from an unused 
classroom!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hiyaaah! 
Reveal yourseelf!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Kyaah!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Th, the wind blew the poster! 
It totally ripped it… ahh……
At this rate, I'll finally……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Whew… I can settle down at last! 
Well, it's about time to get to the 
competi……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ……It's already eveningggg!!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The competition is already over!? 
This can't beee～～!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
There you are, Bakushin O. I've been 
looking for you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The award ceremony is about to begin. 
Follow me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohhh!? A commendation!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But I wasn't able to compete in
anything!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, maybe it's the honor student first 
prize! Then, that makes sense!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But then, I think I should be winning
that award every day!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You're a noisy one, aren't you… 
Just stop talking and follow me!

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
――So, today's "Best Sprinter" is Ms. 
Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ehh!? 
"Best Sprinter"!?

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The reason for her vote was that she was 
"faster than anyone else today." 
Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Th-this can't be! Although it's true
that I'm faster than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A sprinter award? Not an honor student 
award?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Huuuuh～… 
Bummer.

Sakura Bakushin O's spirits were a
little low, but in the end, the fan
appreciation event was a success.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
――So, the special award from the student 
council, the "Good Work" award, goes to 
Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The "Good Work" award ！！！！

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
The way you spent the day running all 
around the school was simply exemplary! 
Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh…! 
Ohhhh～!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Exemplary!! And that's a seal of
approval from the student council!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I can now say that I am a super-honor
student! And, well, I guess you could
say I'm a brilliant class president!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You'll get an extra prize. The student 
council has a gift for you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yaay! 
It must be a shield, or maybe a trophy!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: No, incorrect.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
――It's cleaning up the mess you made
while you were running around!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
In the hallway! In front of the school
gate! The classroom! The racecourse!
I'll have every last one of them
spotless!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Shooock!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But, let us accept this! It is said that
"the bird that rises rides on the wind."

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm Sakura Bakushin O, receiver of the 
"Good Work" award! Let us clean with 
grace!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Bakushiiiin! 
Flapflaaaaap!!
(Thump, crash, bang!!)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I told you not to make an even larger
mess!

At any rate, the Fan Appreciation
Festival ended up being a huge success!
